member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.ITestRunner
member.summary: Interface implemented by all test runners.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestRunner.Load(NUnit.Engine.TestPackage)
member.summary: Load a TestPackage for possible execution

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestRunner.Unload
member.summary: Unload any loaded TestPackage. If none is loaded, the call is ignored.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestRunner.Run(NUnit.Engine.ITestEventHandler,NUnit.Engine.TestFilter)
member.summary: Run the tests in a loaded TestPackage
member.param: A TestFilter used to select tests
member.returns: A TestEngineResult giving the result of the test execution

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestRunner.Explore(NUnit.Engine.TestPackage,NUnit.Engine.TestFilter)
member.summary: Explore a TestPackage and return information about the tests found.

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.ITestEventHandler
member.summary: The ITestProgressHandler interface is used to receive notices of significant events while a test is running.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestEventHandler.OnTestEvent(System.String)
member.summary: Handle a progress report, which may include info about tests starting or stopping as well as text output to be displayed by the runner.

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.TestEngineActivator
member.summary: TestEngineActivator creates an instance of the test engine and returns an ITestEngine interface.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.TestEngineActivator.CreateInstance
member.summary: Create an instance of the test engine using default values for the assembly and type names.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.TestEngineActivator.CreateInstance(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create an instance of the test engine using provided values for the assembly and type names. This method is intended for use in experimenting with alternate implementations.
member.param: The name of the assembly to be used.
The name of the Type to be used.

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.TestFilter
member.summary: Abstract base for all test filters. A filter is represented by an XmlNode with <filter> as it's topmost element. In the console runner, filters serve only to carry this XML representation, as all filtering is done by the engine.

member.name: F:NUnit.Engine.TestFilter.Empty
member.summary: The empty filter - one that always passes.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.TestFilter.Text
member.summary: Gets the XML representation of this filter as a string.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.TestFilter.Xml
member.summary: Gets the XML representation of this filter as an XmlNode

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.ITestEngineResult
member.summary: Interface implemented by classes that return results from the test engine. The result info is represented as XML.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.ITestEngineResult.HasErrors
member.summary: Gets a flag indicating whether this result contains any general errors, excluding test errors or failures.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.ITestEngineResult.Errors
member.summary: Gets a list of errors from the result. These are general execution errors and don't include test errors or failures.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.ITestEngineResult.Xml
member.summary: Gets the XML representing a single test result.
member.exception: If the result is empty or has multiple XML nodes.

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.TestPackage
member.summary: TestPackage holds information about a set of tests to be loaded by a TestRunner. Each TestPackage represents tests for a single assembly. Multiple assemblies are represented by use of subpackages.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.TestPackage.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Construct a TestPackage, specifying a file path for the assembly or project to be used.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.TestPackage.#ctor(System.String[])
member.summary: Construct an anonymous TestPackage that wraps multiple assemblies or projects as subpackages.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.TestPackage.Add(System.String)
member.summary: Add a test file to the package.
member.param: The test file to be added

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.TestPackage.GetSetting``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Return the value of a setting or a default.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.TestPackage.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the package

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.TestPackage.FullName
member.summary: Gets the path to the file containing tests. It may be an assembly or a recognized project type.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.TestPackage.TestFiles
member.summary: Gets an array of the test files contained in this package

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.TestPackage.Settings
member.summary: Gets the settings dictionary for this package.

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.ITestEngine
member.summary: ITestEngine represents an instance of the test engine.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestEngine.InitializeServices
member.summary: Create and initialize the standard set of services used in the Engine. This interface is not normally called by user code. Programs linking only to only to the nunit.engine.api assembly are given a pre-initialized instance of TestEngine. Programs that link directly to nunit.engine usually do so in order to perform custom initialization.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestEngine.Explore(NUnit.Engine.TestPackage,NUnit.Engine.TestFilter)
member.summary: Returns an XML representation of the tests contained in a test package.
member.param: The test package to be explored.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestEngine.Run(NUnit.Engine.TestPackage,NUnit.Engine.ITestEventHandler,NUnit.Engine.TestFilter)
member.summary: Runs the tests specified by a test package and returns results as an XmlNode.
member.param: The test package to be run.
A test listener to receive progress notifications. Null indicates no progress notifications should be sent.
A test filter indicating which tests should run. Null indicates no filtering.
member.returns: An XmlNode representing the results of the run.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestEngine.GetRunner
member.summary: Returns a test runner instance for use by clients that need to load the tests once and run them multiple times.

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.ITestAgent
member.summary: The ITestAgent interface is implemented by remote test agents.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestAgent.Start
member.summary: Starts the agent, performing any required initialization

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestAgent.Stop
member.summary: Stops the agent, releasing any resources

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestAgent.CreateRunner
member.summary: Creates a test runner

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.ITestAgent.Agency
member.summary: Gets the agency with which this agent is associated.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.ITestAgent.Id
member.summary: Gets a Guid that uniquely identifies this agent.

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.ITestAgency
member.summary: The ITestAgency interface is implemented by a TestAgency in order to allow TestAgents to register with it.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.ITestAgency.Register(NUnit.Engine.ITestAgent)
member.summary: Registers an agent with an agency

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.TestEngineError
member.summary: TestEngineError represents an error that occured in executing an API method.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.TestEngineError.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Construct a TestEngineError from a message

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.TestEngineError.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Construct a TestEngineError from a message and stack trace.

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.TestEngineError.Message
member.summary: Gets the error message from an error

member.name: P:NUnit.Engine.TestEngineError.StackTrace
member.summary: Gets the stack trace for an error, if present

member.name: T:NUnit.Engine.NUnitEngineException
member.summary: NUnitEngineException is thrown when the engine has been called with improper values or when a particular facility is not available.

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.NUnitEngineException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Construct with a message

member.name: M:NUnit.Engine.NUnitEngineException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Construct with a message and inner exception

member.summary: Serialization constructor
